A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What an amazing trip I have now seen it two time in the cinema and found it breathtaking. A cleaver balance of whit\, jokes\, action and drama with a touch of romance. I'm a 46 year old fan who watched Star Wars in the drive-in in 1977 I met and fell in love with my wife at a star wars fan club 22 years ago so I have a big chunk of my heart invested in this franchise.
